helio.materialiser.executors

Class ExecutableLinkRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.executors.ExecutableLinkRule

  • public class ExecutableLinkRule
extends java.lang.Object
    This objects wraps a LinkRule extending its functionalities, enabling deciding whether two subjects should be linked, producing such link, and storing the link in the MaterialiserCache
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

      This constructor instantiates the ExecutableLinkRule

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExecutableLinkRule

        public ExecutableLinkRule(java.lang.Integer id,
                          java.lang.String sourceSubject,
                          java.lang.String targetSubject,
                          java.lang.String expression,
                          java.lang.String sourceValuesExtracted,
                          java.lang.String targetValuesExtracted,
                          java.lang.String predicate,
                          java.lang.String inversePredicate)
        This constructor instantiates the ExecutableLinkRule
        Parameters:
        id - a valid id identifying this link rule
        sourceSubject - a source subject to be linked
        targetSubject - a target subject to be linked
        expression - the link rule itself is an expression that must be instantiated becoming a predicate, and then, evaluated returning true if the link exists.
        sourceValuesExtracted - the values from the source that are required to initialize the expression
        targetValuesExtracted - the values from the target that are required to initialize the expression
        predicate - the RDF predicate that links the source subject with the target
        inversePredicate - the RDF predicate that links the target subject with the source, i.e., the inverse relationship

        This method executes the link rule and, if a link is generated, stores the results in the MaterialiserCache
